meanings.definition: relating to the cultivation of fruit trees
meanings.sent1: The farmer attended a pomological workshop to learn about growing apple trees.
meanings.sent2: The pomological society organized a tour of different orchards in the region.
meanings.sent3: The pomological expert joked that talking to the trees made them grow faster.
meanings.sent4: Her pomological skills blossomed like the trees she nurtured.
meanings.sent5: The pomological advice he received was as sweet as the fruits he harvested.

meanings.definition: the study of fruits and their cultivation
meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in pomological research to help improve fruit quality.
meanings.sent2: The library had a vast collection of books on pomological studies.
meanings.sent3: During the pomological class, they tasted different fruits to understand their flavors better.
meanings.sent4: His passion for pomological exploration led him to discover new fruit varieties.
meanings.sent5: The pomological textbook was filled with colorful illustrations of various fruits.
